page.title: 15EDUCATION IN THE AREA
page.content: This is a brief description of the Education System found in the area. Playgroups have been set up for the 3 to 4 year olds,these are usually voluntary run schemes. The next step can be the Nursery Schools taking 4 to 5 year olds.These are professionally staffed by teachers and nursery nurses. Infant and Junior Schools come next taking the 5 to 11 year old pupils. Leicester then has two types of secondary schooling 1.The Middle School(High School) system this takes the 11 to 14 year olds.No external examinations are taken. 2.Finally there is the Upper School taking 14 to 18 year students. However there still exists some 11 to 16 year old Schools and Community Colleges in the inner City area.
